column1: Kata Robata////the only star is for food because it is good
column2: but service is terrible and they are very discriminating! When I sat between two white customer
column3: the server would constantly ask them how everything is ? Do they need anything else? Do they need dessert?
column4: even he would talk jokes with them
column5: but he never spoke me at all after I order
column8: he gave check to people next to me
column9: but I got wait another 15 minutes
column10: and finally he gave me the check
column11: after I complained to the manager
column12: the manager even laughed at the discriminating things
column13: it is a terrible experience! Never gonna go back there again!
